mapper.update:
update member_recharge_detail
seller_no = #{sellerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shopper_no = #{shopperNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
donation_amount = #{donationAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_chenal = #{payChenal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update member_recharge_detail set seller_no = #{sellerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopper_no = #{shopperNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, donation_amount = #{donationAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_chenal = #{payChenal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from member_recharge_detail where gmt_create <= to_date(#{timeUp},'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') and gmt_create >= to_date(#{timeDown},'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
